attributes.action: Continue the mandatory mask and meter distance rule
attributes.additional_details:
Whilst the vaccines have certainly helped lower the hospital admission and death rate, there is still an alarming increase in cases.The pandemic is hardly over and opening up so abruptly could lead to disastrous outcomes by winter. If we truly want to keep ourselves and this country safe, we must keep the most basic rule and continue wearing masks whilst keeping our distance. 
If we want to protect the NHS from any further strain, we must wear a mask and keep our distances.
attributes.background: Mandatory mask wearing and meter distance rule needs to be kept for our safety as a country. Now is not the time to drop our guard down and get rid of the restrictions when there is an alarming rate of increase in cases. We must keep these two basic rules until the cases go down.
